members.role: Ten Titanic Captains - Second Ship Captain
members.joinCircumstances: Shiryu saved Blackbeard and his crew from Magellan's poison by providing antidotes. In gratitude and recognition of his power, Blackbeard invited Shiryu to join the crew, which he accepted.

keyMoments.title: Saved from Magellan's Poison
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates are saved from certain death when Shiryu provides antidotes to Magellan's deadly poison.
keyMoments.significance: This moment demonstrates the extreme danger Blackbeard's crew faced during their Impel Down raid and sets up Shiryu's recruitment.

keyMoments.title: Shiryu Joins the Crew
keyMoments.description: Shiryu officially joins the Blackbeard Pirates, becoming one of the Ten Titanic Captains and the second strongest member of the crew.
keyMoments.significance: This recruitment significantly strengthens the Blackbeard Pirates and marks the beginning of their rise to Yonko status.

jollyRoger.description: Three skulls with crossed bones, symbolizing Blackbeard's ability to wield multiple Devil Fruit powers

keyMoments.title: Buggy Revealed as Former Member
keyMoments.description: It is publicly revealed that Buggy the Clown was formerly a member of the legendary Roger Pirates, the crew of the Pirate King.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation dramatically elevates Buggy's reputation and becomes a cornerstone of his rise to power despite his relatively weak combat abilities.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a prominent mustache, representing Gol D. Roger
